pullrequest.title: implement screw joint in simbody and clean up screw joint constraint in ode

content.raw: @hsu, I just noticed that there are some deprecation warnings related with SetAttribute/GetAttribute used in some tests and plugins. Take a look at the branch simbody_caguero_fixwarnings that replaces the deprecated methods by SetParam/GetParam.
content.html: @hsu, I just noticed that there are some deprecation warnings related with SetAttribute/GetAttribute used in some tests and plugins. Take a look at the branch simbody_caguero_fixwarnings that replaces the deprecated methods by SetParam/GetParam.
